original: You end up getting wasted at the Christmas party (sorry, Holiday party) and having rough, animalistic sex with one of your co-workers in the parking lot.
translated: 你在圣诞派对 (抱歉，有人不过圣诞，还是节日派对吧) 上喝了个烂醉，然后在停车场和一位同事发生了粗暴的性行为。

original: B)...never say another word to them again but make lewd comments about penis size/vagina tightness behind their back?
translated: B)...再也不跟对方说话，但在背后露骨地评价对方的阴茎大小/阴道紧致程度？

original: C)...put all your efforts into getting them fired?
translated: C)...全力以赴，想方设法让对方被炒？

original: D)...immediately email them a photo of your junk under the heading,"Ding, ding.  Ready for round 2?"
translated: D)...立即打开邮箱，给对方发自己的生殖器照片，标题填「叮，叮。准备好大战第二回合了吗」？
